com.intercom.media

类 VideoCaptureCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intercom.media.VideoCapture
      • com.intercom.media.VideoCaptureCamera
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.hardware.Camera.PreviewCallback
    直接已知子类:
    VideoCaptureAndroid

    public abstract class VideoCaptureCamera
extends VideoCapture
implements android.hardware.Camera.PreviewCallback
    Video Capture Device extension of VideoCapture to provide common functionality for capture using android.hardware.Camera API (deprecated in API 21). Normal Android and Tango devices are extensions of this class.
